```{r}
library(readxl)
dataset <- read_excel("data/dataset para análisis exploratorio.xlsx")
data <- dataset[-1]
```
## Clustering intro

### K-means

```{r}
set.seed(1257)
kmodel.2 <- kmeans(data, centers=2)
kmodel.2
```


```{r }
k.1 <- dataset[kmodel.2$cluster==1,]
k.2 <- dataset[kmodel.2$cluster==2,]
```
#### Cluster 1
```{r }
plot_histogram(k.1)
```
#### Cluster 2

```{r }
plot_histogram(k.2)
```
